item.description:
About this Meetup Group

Happy drumming to you all!

FRIDAY April 10, 2009 7PM

Alan

The DrumConnection

Meet other local Hand-Drummers who are interested creating community through the rich history of Africa and it's people. Drum Circles are a great way to stay connected to our inner rhythms. You'll learn some new rhythms, get some technique help and meet some great people!

We will come together at 7PM (doors open at 6:45PM) at The DrumRoom 50 Tufts Steet, Arlington, MA Please call 781-316-8068 for further info or just come! Bring your drums or use ours. We will have plenty of drums and some yummy food and drink. On the night of the circle call 617-686-6080 my cell. Alan

Donations: $15.- each. Children under 12 - Free.

Recent feedback...

"Had a wonderful time.... The circle was very welcoming and Alan is a competent, incredibly talented, patient and friendly leader. I really had a wonderful time and I'm hoping to make it a regular activity and perhaps bring a friend. ”
Irene

“ This was a fun time. Alan's leadership style is loose, offering suggestions and some instruction. Nice group of people, too.”
Denise

“ It is the best drumming circle in the area! People really come together in a community, and with a community spirit. Instruments are provided if you don't have one. ... ”
A former member

"Alan, it was an amazing experience being a part of the drum circle on Friday. Thank you for this amazing project, and I'll see you next time, as now i will try to be part of every circle. Thank You."
Rosangela.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll welcome you at the door! ...and make sure you are very comfortable.
item.name: The Arlington Drum Circle Meetup - Come Celebrate!
